page.title: 05LANGHAM VILLAGE SHOP
page.content: {Langham village shop and Post Office is owned by Mr.Forder. He is also the{Village Postmaster}and the {Milkman. He serves{600 people}with Milk and{300 with Newspapers. He has been there for six years. Before that, the shop was opened in{1912,}after the first shop was burnt down. The land was bought to build a shop on it in 1816. Mr.Forder enjoys his work in the shop, although he has to work very long hours. He has to{start work at {4.00 a.m}to get the newspapers and milk ready for delivery. He buys most of his stock from wholesales and has had few complaints from his customers. { }
